name: Subek
description: The Subek is a large humanoid creature with a chaotic and aggressive nature, especially during flood season. It possesses exceptional physical strength and natural armor, making it a dangerous opponent in melee combat.
memorable: Its unique Blood Frenzy ability makes it particularly lethal when near food, enhancing its attacks against weakened foes.
goals: The Subek often seeks to dominate its surroundings, especially when hungry or agitated.
relations: Subek might be encountered in the company of other chaotic creatures or in situations involving floodwaters.
environment: Typically found in areas prone to flooding or near water bodies.
strengths: Very strong and resilient, capable of dealing significant melee damage with multiple attacks.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity makes it slower and less evasive against faster enemies.
attacks: The Subek can perform a multiattack, utilizing a Bite and two Claw attacks, dealing high piercing and slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Flood Fever enhances aggression and melee attack efficiency against injured targets.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, aiding its ability to see in dark environments.
skills: Proficient in History and Investigation, though loses efficiency during its Flood Fever state.
additional_information: Can hold its breath underwater for 15 minutes.
Becomes extremely aggressive when hungry or during flood season.
Loses proficiency in certain skills when affected by Flood Fever.
test_queries: large aggressive humanoid during flood season
substantial melee attacks from a large creature
strong creature that attacks when hungry
